MWC.TacticalData.temporal

Interface TimeProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TimeManager

    public interface TimeProvider
    Interface describing time-related data. It provides functions to both retrieve and modify the current time.
    Author:
    ian.mayo

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String PERIOD_CHANGED_PROPERTY_NAME
      propery name for the time-period being changed
      static java.lang.String TIME_CHANGED_PROPERTY_NAME
      property name for the time being changed

    • Method Detail

      • getPeriod

        TimePeriod getPeriod()
        obtain the time period covered by the data
        Returns:
        the time period

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        identifier for this time provider. We create this so that, when restored, an xy plot can loop through the open plots to determine which time provider to connect to

      • getTime

        HiResDate getTime()
        obtain the current time
        Returns:
        now

      • addListener

        void addListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener,
                 java.lang.String propertyType)
        let somebody start listening to our changes
        Parameters:
        listener - the new listener
        propertyType - the (optional) property to listen to. Use null if you don't mind

      • removeListener

        void removeListener(java.beans.PropertyChangeListener listener,
                    java.lang.String propertyType)
        let somebody stop listening to our changes
        Parameters:
        listener - the old listener
        propertyType - the (optional) property to stop listening to. Use null if you don't mind
